not_found_msg: The page you are looking for does not exist.
network: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
forbidden: You do not have permission to access this page.
too_many: Too many requests. Please try again later.
form_invalid: Please fix the highlighted fields and try again.
unauth_msg: You must be logged in to access this page.
no_perm_msg: You do not have the required permissions to view this page.
public_only_msg: You are already logged in and cannot access this page.
Username must be at least 5 characters.
Username must be at most 50 characters.
Password must be at least 8 characters.
Password must contain at least one upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number.
Phone number must be at least 7 digits.
Phone number must be at most 15 digits.
